price: E eles te perguntam, Muhammad, por Zul Qarnain. Dize: "Far-vos-ei menção dele."
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
